name: Dungeon Killer (Ciso)
description:
This is my first App, also has some soundtracks that you my like or disslike when you don't have nothing to do.

I've been working really hard this year trying to understand Godot Engine and programming in general, i always had the idea that you need to be from the NASA to make programming works, well im still learning but in the meantime i can tell im fascinating on this as i love playing games and making games its huge its feels just like creating a world from scratches.

I used # Super Dungeon Delve game and restructured at my end adding functions and trying to improve it,  also some resources from Game Endeavours were used in it. Hope you folks like it :) add comments and tell me what i could ve done better, i apreciate it.  Im still learning as i go on my journey, i believe someday ill improve as im interacting on godot.
